examples: Let's take a walk in the park.
She walks to work every day.
Vamos dar uma caminhada no parque.
Ela caminha para o trabalho todos os dias.

suggested: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field.
Walking alone on a rainy day can be a melancholic experience.
Walking away from a heated argument can be a sign of strength and control over one's emotions.
Discovering a new path while on a leisurely walk can be a surprising and exciting experience.
The smell of freshly blooming flowers during a springtime walk.
The feeling of the sun on your face during a warm summer walk.
The connection to nature and the environment while taking a peaceful walk in the countryside.
